item.title: Anyone use Ryse Up app?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Anyone here use the RYSE UP app?

 

RYSE puts emerging creatives in front of major artists for opportunities to be discovered.

 
I’m on the lookout for a creative partner for writing and production, as well as female vocalists for a couple of electro-pop tracks. So, I thought I’d take a look.

It’s a real mixed bag. Some clearly serious users with experience. But others try-hards make it feel like a hook-up app.

It does seem to have a heavy slant towards rap and r&b.

 
I know only a few here collab outside of the community, so I’m wondering if anyone here’s checked it out — and found it useful.

Read full topic
